listitem.simpara: The codename for UCS 3.2 is Borgfeld (Bug 31686).
The welcome message is now shown through /etc/issue (Bug 31094).
All previous errata updates for UCS 3.1 have been integrated (Bug 31330).

listitem.para: The Debian point update 6.0.8 was incorporated. Among other changes it also fixes several security issues: Bug 31956).

listitem.simpara: libxtst: CVE-2013-2063 (Bug 31483).
libxxf86vm: CVE-2013-2001 (Bug 31501).
libxfixes: CVE-2013-1983 (Bug 31461).
libxrandr: CVE-2013-1986 (Bug 31480).
libxcursor: CVE-2013-2003 (Bug 31470).
libxrender: CVE-2013-1987 (Bug 31464).
libxinerama: CVE-2013-1985 (Bug 31504).
xorg-server: CVE-2013-1940 (Bug 29132).
xorg-server-video-openchrome: CVE-2013-1994 (Bug 31467).
libxext: CVE-2013-1982 (Bug 31491).
libxres: CVE-2013-1988 (Bug 31485).
openvpn: CVE-2013-2061 (Bug 31347).
libxslt: CVE-2012-6139 (Bug 30935).

In the update from UCS-3.0 to UCS-3.1 the template for /etc/network/interfaces was converted from a single-file template into a multi-file template. To preserve user modifications the original file was moved to the new location. This breaks the network tools, since the generated file now contains two declarations for the loopback interface. This situation is now detected and the second declaration is commented out (Bug 32297).

During the update the automatic restart of the network is disabled by setting the &ucsUCRV; interfaces/restart/auto to false (Bug 31844). In the past this has caused time-outs and re-connect problems. The previous value is restored after the package univention-base-files has been updated successfully.
The LDAP schema is now checked in preup.shif slapd is installed (Bug 25674).
univention-horde4 has been removed from the software selection. Horde is available in the Univention App Center (Bug 31812).
The input of non-ASCII characters in input fields has been disabled (Bug 24904).

The GRUB configuration of the installation DVD no longer loads the Cirrus graphics module. Instead, standard VGA is now used. In addition the colour depth has been set to 32 bits. This fixes display problems when installing in Citrix Xen Server (Bug 30978).
The Software RAID boot entry has been renamed to expert partitioning (Bug 24051).
Some obsolete code blocks have been removed (Bug 31825).
The input field for the NetBIOS domain name in the basic settings dialogue has been removed for systems which are not a master domain controller (Bug 24442).
The DHCP query button in the network settings dialogue has been removed, instead the DHCP query is performed when DHCP is selected for an interface (Bug 31174).
The error message which is displayed if the hostname starts with digits has been clarified (Bug 29349).
The sort order in the language selection list has been fixed (Bug 24361).
The domainname and windows domainname syntax tests in the basic settings have been fixed (Bug 24888).
Directories created during the installation have their permissions set to 0755 (Bug 29450).
Some problems with screen refreshes in the XenCenter UCS installation have been fixed (Bug 31051).
Samba package lists have been updated to fix deinstallation issues (Bug 30982).
The second password field for entering the join password has been removed (Bug 31965).
The error message has been fixed, which is displayed when the join password is not specified (Bug 23903).
During the boot loader installation more device details are displayed. The installation device is automatically ignored (Bug 25046).
The installer now makes sure that LVM signatures are removed by pvremove before pvcreate is called (Bug 31925).
The installer now shows occurring errors and warning during initial device scan and offers to format the problematic devices with an empty GPT (Bug 31899).

The automatic partitioning has been adapted. It still requires the erasure of all harddisk but as of UCS 3.2-0 the new auto partitioning layout will only use the first available harddisk. If installation profiles are used, the keyword auto_part only accepts the value yes from now on (Bug 31705).
The guessing of the hard disk device in the bootloader module has been fixed (Bug 32632).
The determination of the hostname, if scan="hostname" is set, has been fixed (Bug 29469).
The &ucsUCRV; descriptions in univention-net-installer have been revised (Bug 30948).

Upon installation completion the hostname can be sent to a server (port 49173) by setting installation_feedback_host to the IP address or DNS name of that host (and optionally installation_feedback_port to the port univention-net-installer-daemon is listening on) (Bug 1156).

The package univention-net-installer-daemon has been added. It contains a daemon listening on port 49173 that accepts hostnames and removes the re-installation flag of the computers with hostname (Bug 1156).
The &ucsUCRV; descriptions in univention-grub and univention-bootsplash have been revised (Bug 30943).

The Linux kernel was updated to 3.10.15. The nouveau KMS kernel module is incompatible with the Xorg version in UCS 3.2 and now blacklisted (Bug 31701, Bug 32203). This update also resolves occasional kernel traces when operating a UCS installation in Amazon EC2 (Bug 30369). The firmware packages have been updated to current versions as well. In addition various packages have been updated to ensure compatibility of their DKMS out-of-tree kernel modules with Linux 3.10: openafs, xtables-addons, open-vm-tools, iscsitarget, virtualbox and ndiswrapper.
The kernel 2.6.32 transition packages have been removed (Bug 31593).
The kernel meta packages now enable the &ucsUCRV; update/reboot/required, which triggers a note to the user that the system requires a reboot to complete the update (Bug 24287).

The &ucsUCRV; kernel/blacklist can now be used to prevent kernel modules from being loaded. Multiple entries need to be separated with a semicolon. By default the nouveau module is now blacklisted since the kernel module from 3.10 is incompatible with the Xorg userland (Bug 19892).

listitem.para: The kernel inotify parameters can now be controlled by &ucsUCRV;s (Bug 32327). The default values have been increased to improve support of large environments. The following &ucsUCRV;s are available:

listitem.simpara: kernel/fs/inotify/max_user_instances (default: 512)
kernel/fs/inotify/max_user_watches (default: 32768)
kernel/fs/inotify/max_queued_events (default: 16384)

important.simpara: If these parameters have been manually defined in a local file below /etc/sysctl.d/ the file should be removed and the configured values transfered to the respective &ucsUCRV;s.

listitem.simpara: The &ucsUCRV; descriptions in univention-initrd have been revised (Bug 30943).
The process handling has been improved to prevent issues with processing signals during system calls (Bug 31140).

The &ucsUCR; layers were processed in the wrong order when using the 'search' subcommand. Now all commands consistently return the value from the layer with the highest priority, which are 'force', 'schedule', 'ldap' and 'normal' (Bug 29632).
Changes are now first written to a temporary file first and the file moved in a second step, otherwise the file might be not completely written if UCR tries to read a variable (Bug 31725, Bug 31853).
The &ucsUCR; C library, used by Univention Directory Listener, now considers all layers of &ucsUCR; (Bug 29964).
A new function was added to the Python API to set and unset &ucsUCRV;s atomically through a dictionary (Bug 32544).
The &ucsUCRV; descriptions in univention-network-manager have been revised (Bug 30943).
The &ucsUCRV; descriptions in univention-firewall have been revised (Bug 30943).
OpenLDAP was updated to version 2.4.35 (Bug 31697, Bug 32438).
A segmentation fault in the slapd LDAP server process in cases where non-UTF-8 passwords were used for LDAP bind against the {K5KEY} scheme has been fixed (Bug 31352).
When slapd can not be started by its Init script, slapschema is called to determine the cause and the output is displayed (Bug 23055).
The slapcat output could get truncated during univention-ldap-backup. This issue has been fixed (Bug 31170).
The unused &ucsUCRV; ldap/server/additional has been removed. ldap/server/addition can be used instead (Bug 24507).
The &ucsUCRV; ldap/server/port is now set to 7389 by default (Bug 26888).
The &ucsUCRV; descriptions in univention-ldap, univention-directory-logger and univention-ldap-overlay-memberof have been revised (Bug 30946).
The LDAP attribute univentionShareHost now supports the substring search (Bug 31208).
The slapd init script now supports graceful-restart and graceful-stop, both asking the slapd kindly to stop and then waiting for 120 seconds before forcefully killing the process (Bug 31998).
univention-backup2master now cleans up Samba 4 related objects (Bug 27893).
LDAP ACLs with regular expression have been made more efficient and robust (Bug 29421).
LDAP ACLs have been improved with respect to security (Bug 31305).
univention-ldap-backup now creates a separate logfile during the backup process in /var/univention-backup/ (Bug 31997).
The &ucsUCRV; descriptions in univention-admingrp-user-passwordreset have been revised (Bug 30946).
There are new schema extensions univention-object-metadata.schema and univention-ldap-extension.schema. (Bug 32391).
There is a new schema extension udm_extension.schema. (Bug 32410).
The &ucsUCRV; descriptions in univention-legacy-kolab-schema have been revised (Bug 30946).
The new attribute univentionShareNFSCustomSetting to support custom NFS share settings has been added (Bug 18708).
The password used by the listener to access the LDAP directory is no longer shown in the logfile (Bug 31053).
The failed LDIF mode of the replication did now handle empty values correctly (Bug 25579).
The &ucsUCRV; descriptions in univention-directory-listener and univention-directory-listener have been revised (Bug 30946).
A Listener module for the replication of LDAP schema extensions has been implemented (Bug 31801).
A Listener module for the replication of LDAP ACL extensions has been implemented (Bug 32393).
A Listener module for the replication of UDM syntax extensions has been implemented (Bug 32402).
A Listener module for the replication of UDM hook extensions has been implemented (Bug 32405).
A Listener module for the replication of UDM module extensions has been implemented (Bug 32408).
The &ucsUCRV; windows/domain is now set in univention-join to the value of windows/domain on the DC master (Bug 24442).
Several issues regarding handling long DNs and DNs containing non-alphanumeric characters in univention-run-join-scripts have been fixed (Bug 32005).
univention-server-join now adds /usr/sbin/ and /sbin/ to the shell PATH environment variable before importing the univention shell libs (Bug 31281).
The UMC overview page has been redesigned along with a search for modules (Bugs 31699, 32022, 32023, 32048).
The packages univention-nagios-server, univention-doc and univention-system-setup have been adapted to the new UMC overview page (Bug 32611).
The &ucsUCRV; descriptions in univention-management-console-frontend and univention-management-console have been revised (Bug 30946).

A single sign on feature has been implemented for &ucsUMC;. The head line of UMC now provides a drop down for selecting other UCS systems. The UMC of the selected UCS system will be opened in a new browser window (Bugs 24422, 30744).
Fixed a design issue when trying to horizontally align a certain widget class (Bug 25389).
The version of the JavaScript Dojo Toolkit has been updated to 1.9 (Bug 31639).
Adjusted initial module loading to be more robust (Bug 32140).
Fixed regression in form validation with certain FormWidgets (Bug 30965).
Fixed width of ConfirmDialog in Firefox (Bug 30102).
The width of textarea fields has been fixed (Bug 30889).
A problem in the Text widget has been corrected which caused to a 404 error (Bug 28810).
Inside the "favorite" category, favorites can no longer be removed (Bug 29555).
The username input field of the login dialog stays disabled after a failed relogin (Bug 27989).
A problem with scrollbars in the Dialog widget has been corrected (Bug 30796).
UMC login problems with the demo configuration package installed have been corrected (Bug 31091).
Fixed problems in the login dialog when changing an expired password. Under some circumstances the username sent was wrong and the standby animation did never stop (Bug 31898).
The internal caching mechanism for list entries (e.g., DHCP/DNS entries and IP/MAC addresses for computers) has been improved as it could previously lead to inconsistencies in rare cases (Bug 31510).

The package univention-demo-configuration has been updated in order to allow two new UMCP commands. The former package version led to an error message when opening the Univention App center or the UMC online update module. This issue has been fixed (Bug 31567).
The validate function of the Form widget has been corrected. Previously, no exclamation mark has been displayed when a widget had an invalid value (Bug 31337).
A static array reference in umc/widgets/MultiSelect causing re-occurring entries in umc/widgets/MultiUploader has been corrected (Bug 31318).
As page URLs for Piwik, only the origin host without path is specified (Bug 30961).
In umc/widgets/Grid:actions a specific tooltip class can now be defined for actions (Bug 31308).
The UMC session is now kept active during the dialog for restarting the UMC server (Bug 31642).
Problems with standby overlay animations not covering the full underlying area have been corrected (Bug 31581).
The actions saving and cancel editing UDM objects are published now for the Piwik system (Bug 31161).
Support for the following locales has been added to UMC: German (Austria), German (Switzerland), English (United Kingdom) (Bug 31377).
Umlauts in certificates are now imported and shown correctly (Bug 30722).
Some CSS adaptions have been made (Bug 32318).
Unexpected errors that caused UMC server and modules to exit are now logged (Bug 31130).
The UMC ACL evaluation has been simplified which improves the UMC login performance (Bug 28059, Bug 32747).
Reloading of UCR variables has been improved, and references to the external library pyinotify have been removed (Bug 31752).
The license is now loaded and displayed in the UMC license info dialog even if the license is invalid or expired (Bug 31673).
The host matching with wildcards in UMC ACLs has been re-enabled. (Bug 32850).
Basic UCS components (such as Samba, KDE, nagios, print server etc.) have been integrated into the App Center and can now be installed from there (Bugs 32301, 32302).

Fixed an issue when closing the App Center tab in the Management Console: The backend shut down the module when no further requests regarding the progress of an installation was sent. When this happened during installation the package database could become temporarily broken (Bug 30611).

Tests run before installing an application can now prevent continuation or just emit a warning that it is not recommended to continue. Notable test that has become a warning: Check whether enough memory is available (Bug 31856).
Added a Shop button for those applications supporting it (Bug 32282).
Moved dialog for requesting a new license with key ID to the global license dialog of the Univention Directory Manager (Bug 32389).
Prevent concurrent package operations in the same session (Bug 31382).
Applications that require a server role other than the used server role are removed from the App Center Page (Bug 32426).
Applications now register themselves automatically in the LDAP directory (Bug 32416).
Added a progress bar while fetching software changes in App Center and speeded up the process of retrieving this information (Bug 30798).
Clarified the German translation of the error message when there is insufficient RAM available while trying to install an application (Bug 32117).
Moved the dialog showing all App details to a dedicated page and use this also for the Installed Apps module (Bug 31891).
The Open button now opens a dedicated administration module within UMC or the web interface (Bug 30759).

Tests whether the user may continue are run after the "Install" (or "Upgrade" or "Uninstall") button is clicked. They are all run at once and for some failed tests solutions are offered (Bug 31737, Bug 30289, Bug 32163) .
Added system components to the App Center (Bug 32308, Bug 32309).
Made free memory calculation more robust in OpenVZ environments (Bug 30659).
Made component registration in univention-add-app more robust (Bug 32398).
Added switch to install the latest version of the application in univention-add-app (Bug 31157).
Fixed App installation with --all and --master when pointing to an outdated App version in univention-add-app (Bug 31279).
The full progress bar is used while installing an application when not installing packages on other servers in the domain (Bug 31184).
Applications now can state that they depend on other Applications (Bug 30077).

If an application is installed, the system does not dist-upgrade anymore. If the App is upgraded, the system still does a dist-upgrade but shows a warning that the dist-upgrade may include errata updates (Bug 31129, Bug 31278).
Allow HTML in the LongDescription of the ini file (Bug 31185).
The button to request a new license is shown even when the application cannot be installed (Bug 31166).
A typo in the command line tool univention-management-console-client has been corrected (Bug 30605).
UNIVENTION_DEBUG_BEGIN and UNIVENTION_DEBUG_END information are no longer logged (Bug 29603).
Fixed resolving dependencies of packages: Errors from apt are handled correctly (Bug 31055).
Under certain circumstances packages installed directly by the App Center could be marked as automatically installed and thus be autoremoved. This has been corrected (Bug 31155).
A problem which caused to crash the UMC server when setting an invalid locale has been corrected (Bug 28657).
Fixed a segmentation fault that happened while upgrading an App under certain circumstances. Now the package manager always uses the latest package cache (Bug 31282).
Checking hardware requirements when upgrading an App has been disabled (Bug 31354).
Added helpful messages when new license is not yet installed and no UDM is present (Bug 30629).
Supporting new HTML READMEs INSTALL, POST_UPDATE, POST_INSTALL, UNINSTALL, POST_UNINSTALL (Bug 31803, Bug 32502).
The session is now kept alive after having installed an App until confirmation (Bug 31886).
Fixed string formatting of one error message (Bug 32193).
Speedup updates by committing repository files only once (Bug 31228).
Opening a second App Center module in UMC is now prevented and a traceback when opening the module has been corrected (Bug 31662).
Added a link to the campaign "Vote for app!" (Bug 31625).

The package for the App Center UMC module now ships a new LDAP schema extension univention-app.schema using the new mechanism implemented via Bug 32412). Building on this new LDAP schema the package installs a new UDM module appcenter/app for the registration of App metadata (Bug 32414).

section.title: Univention Management Console / Univention Directory Manager modules

listitem.simpara: The UCS license check now ignores temporary user objects (Bug 31167).

The attributes User ID Group ID and GECOS in the users module, FQDN in the computers module and Next IP in the network module have been removed from the advanced search as they are not searchable in the UMC (Bug 28803).
The &ucsUCRV; descriptions in univention-directory-manager-modules and univention-management-console-module-udm have been revised (Bug 30946).
Moved dialog for requesting a new license with key ID from Univention App Center to the global license dialog (Bug 32389).

Opening certain LDAP objects took very long. Now a progress bar is shown upon opening any LDAP object and widgets for attributes that may have multiple values do not block anymore while being built (Bug 31376).
Added a progress bar while moving objects. This will prevent a timeout when moving a lot of them at once (Bug 25465).
Forcing a user to change the password upon next login has been changed internally when using Samba. It has been adapted to newer versions of samba and do not require PAM anymore (Bug 17890).
Widgets in the policy tab of an object now show an empty value if the attribute is not set (previously they showed the first all the available choices) (Bug 31017).

The internal default of multi value attributes has been changed to a more reasonable one. This addresses several issues in the frontend, including a bogus empty user remaining in a group when removing all users was intended (Bug 29680).
Univention Directory Manager modules that support superordinates now respect the autosearch setting via UCR when changing the superordinate in the advanced search form (Bug 29498).
Added a button to easily send traceback information of unexpected errors to Univention (Bug 31056).
A broken LDAP authentication in proof_dns_dhcp_records has been corrected (Bug 30903).

The following syntax classes received lookup optimizations which result in faster object opening especially in larger environments: UserDN, UserID, GroupDN, GroupID, UCS_Server, DNS_ForwardZone, DNS_ReverseZone, WritableShare, DomainController, GroupName, UserName, nfsShare (Bug 30991, Bug 31560).

All syntax files and hooks files are re-evaluated every time a new session is created. This prevents errors caused by referenced classes unknown during univention-management-console-server startup (Bug 31154).
The debug output is now explicitly flushed in order to prevent partial or missing lines in the log file (Bug 31421).
Removed duplicate mapping.register call for univentionInventoryNumber (Bug 24102).
The package univention-admingrp-user-passwordreset has been updated to work with UCS 3.2 (Bug 25408).

The package univention-admingrp-user-passwordreset does now support the protection of groups through the &ucsUCRV; ldap/acl/user/passwordreset/protected/gid. By default the group Domain Admins is protected (Bug 29710).
Various text changes have been made, translations have been adapted and added. Descriptions were added or made clearer (Bug 24727, Bug 29552, Bug 23691, Bug 24028, Bug 23698, Bug 23697, Bug 23695).
Newly added superordinates are now opened correctly on mouse click (Bug 25008).
Displaying a feedback message after importing a license was made more robust (Bug 29713).
A sometimes erroneous evaluation of policies as shown in the detail view of UDM objects in UMC has been corrected (Bug 31916).
Moving and deleting the LDAP base is now prevented in the LDAP directory in UMC (Bug 24642).
A new UDM module settings/ldapschema has been implemented for registration and replication of LDAP schema extensions (Bug 32412).
A new UDM module settings/ldapacl has been implemented for registration and replication of LDAP ACL extensions (Bug 32411).
A new UDM module settings/udm_hook has been implemented for registration and replication of UDM hook extensions (Bug 32403).
A new UDM module settings/udm_syntax has been implemented for registration and replication of UDM syntax extensions (Bug 32406).
A new UDM module settings/udm_module has been implemented for registration and replication of UDM module extensions (Bug 32409).
Avoid problems when reloading UDM modules. This could cause the UMC Server to crash when UDM modules and UDM syntax definitions were out of sync (Bug 32565).
The representation of the DHCP and DNS module have been revised (Bug 32381).
A traceback which occured when renaming computer objects with set DNS reverse zone has been fixed. (Bug 31435).
The enforcement of required multivalue attributes now also works when using the UDM CLI. (Bug 31302).
An mistake in the jpegPhoto UDM syntax has been corrected which lead to invalid data getting stored in the LDAP with some jpeg Photos. (Bug 30342).
Passwords are now stored in the password history as salted password hashes plus the salt and the ID of the hashing algorithm (Bug 30981).
Fix marking of invalid widgets when saving (Bug 25500).
The create report action now applies to the selection instead of the whole search result (Bug 32749).
UDM modules now try to automatically reestablish the connection to the LDAP server if possible (Bug 32617).
The groups/group module now considers the options flag via UDM CLI (Bug 32853).

It is now possible to set the AD group type for groups. The group type is synchronized to Samba 4 via the Univention S4 connector if the &ucsUCRV; connector/s4/mapping/group/grouptype is set to true (Bug 32853).
Several internal users and groups are now hidden from the UMC modules, for example the AD pseudo groups like Authenticated Users or Everyone (Bug 32871).
The new extended attribute "objectFlag" has been added to the UDM modules users, groups and computers (Bug 31408).
The &ucsUCRV; apache2/startsite will be set to correct values when reinstalling, uninstalling and updating univention-system-setup-boot (Bug 31385, Bug 31643).
The &ucsUCRV; descriptions in univention-system-setup have been revised (Bug 30943).
Added error handling in case the download of required packages for univention-system-setup-boot failed. This could prevent a role switch when configuring the system in appliance setup (Bug 30896).
The progress during (un)installation of software components was broken (Bug 32148).
The software page has been removed from basic settings. Software components should be managed in the Univention App Center. The software page is still available in the appliance setup (Bug 32471).
Disabled Firefox update popups during appliance setup (Bug 30980).
The windows domain name is no longer queried (or displayed) in the basic settings on non DC master systems (Bug 24442).
Fixed an infinite loop when validating the domainname and windows domainname (Bug 28574).
The URL to a SDB article has been internationalised (Bug 30776).
The SSL fields are now updated automatically during appliance setup, depending on default locale chosen (Bug 29658).
Added support to configure Bridge, Bond and VLAN devices (Bug 30816, Bug 30878).
The wording in the description of server roles has been unified (Bug 30773).
The system setup script order is now defined properly (Bug 29714).
When inserting invalid values (e.g. password) the invalid field is now focused (Bug 31021).
The software setup now maintains the defined package order (Bug 31960).
The redirection to the new UMC URL when changing IP configuration in system setup has been made more robust (Bug 29973).
When changing the SSL certificate a dialog is displayed to restart the server components (Bug 29480).
A profile parsing function was fixed to not strip all double quotes from supplied values, which now allows to use quotes in passwords (Bug 32463).
Spaces are no longer allowed in the username (this can be overwritten by setting the &ucsUCRV; directory/manager/web/modules/users/user/properties/username/syntax to string, Bug 19441).
Some old code has been removed (Bug 28671).
The mail option is not connected to any password related properties anymore (Bug 31868).
A traceback which occurred when creating a user with just the person option set has been corrected (Bug 24351).
The descriptions of exteneded attribute properties have been improved and the layout of the module has been rebuilt (Bug 28629).
After a re-join a complete restart of the system can now be performed directly via a confirmation dialog (Bug 9927).
The module now shows available Application updates from the App Center. Updates can be installed in the App Center module (Bug 30548).
A problem has been corrected which led to invalid PTR records when changing the DNS forward zone of a computer object, or to the loss of PTR records when changing it's DNS reverse zone (Bug 30905).
A traceback which occurred when removing the MAC address or network from a computer with DHCP entry has been fixed (Bug 28945, Bug 29676).
The removal of user and group quotas in the print quota policy has been fixed (Bug 31703).
A typo has been fixed (Bug 21997).
The selectable print servers are now limited to servers with univentionService=Print (Bug 25216).
A mapping which broke the representation of TXT records for DNS forward zones has been fixed (Bug 29681).
The pointer record attribute of the DNS pointer module is now a multi value attribute (Bug 28667, Bug 31103).
The term UDM Web in the extended attributes module has been replaced by UMC (Bug 27948).
The &ucsUCRV; descriptions in univention-directory-reports have been revised (Bug 30946).
The English and German texts of the System information module have been adapted (Bug 30797).
Support of ext4 partitions has been added to the filesystem quota module (Bug 24357).
A typo in the German localization in univention-management-console-module-quota has been corrected (Bug 28377).
The shutdown/reboot message in the Reboot module has been adapted. Furthermore the cancel button in the confirmation dialog is the default now (Bug 22831).
The use of eval() has been replaced with getattr() in several UMC modules (Bug 31523).
The Software monitor module has been thoroughly revised (Bug 30967, Bug 29655, Bug 24360, Bug 24633, Bug 9706, Bug 28787, Bug 28804, Bug 29610).
The VNC module has been removed (Bug 30158). As an alternative xrdp can be used for remote administration. It is available in the Univention App Center.
The search pattern have been more secured and unified in the UVMM and Printers modules (Bug 28260).
DNS: Pointer objects are now called DNS: Pointer records to be consistent with the naming conventions of other DNS resource records in UDM modules (Bug 24661).
When appending name servers to DNS forward and DNS reverse zones, a trailing dot will be added to every entry if missing, not only the first one (Bug 29568).
The UMC Share module layout and texts have been improved (Bug 32882).
Custom NFS settings can now be added to NFS Shares (Bug 18708).

section.title: Univention Directory Manager command line interface and related tools

listitem.simpara: The code of the command line programs has been modernized (Bug 30974.
An error message regarding an existing directory has been corrected (Bug 29074.

An error in univention-dnsedit which occurred when trying to remove the only location from a SRV record has been corrected. When removing the only location, the whole SRV record will be removed now (Bug 32592).

section.title: Development of modules for Univention Management Console

listitem.simpara: The recommendation for setting up a UCR policy has been fixed to mention the correct &ucsUCRV; updater/secure_apt (Bug 24808).

A locally required and mirrored component from a separate repository in same cases blocked the update of the local repository. This has been changed to now always update the local repository as soon as a new release is available. The condition is still check by each host individually (Bug 31060).
The pre- and post-updater scripts of locally mirrored but disabled components are now also retrieved (Bug 30756).
On a local repository server a repository policy no longer sets the source server to itself (Bug 31426).
The &ucsUCRV; descriptions in univention-updater have been revised (Bug 30943).

The updater scripts preup.sh and postup.sh are digitally signed from UCS version 3.2-0 onwards. Both updater and mirror will refuses to download them if they are not signed by any PGP key stored in trust-ring of apt-key. The verification can be disabled using the &ucsUCRV; repository/online/verify and repository/mirror/verify (Bug 28045).
The &ucsUCRV; descriptions in univention-maintenance have been revised (Bug 30943).
The &ucsUCRV; descriptions in univention-pkgdb have been revised (Bug 30948).

Unjoin scripts have been added to the packages univention-pkgdb, univention-management-console-module-pkgdb, and univention-pkgdb-tools. The unjoin scripts remove the service entry from the server object and the DNS service entry and undo the UMC module registration (Bug 32492).
The function call_joinscript() has been modified. The start and end of every executed joinscript will be displayed on console (Bug 29263).

The generation of internally used passwords (e.g. machine passwords) has been unified. Several packages now using a special function from shell-univention-lib respectively python-univention-lib to create such password. The length and complexity can be configured via the &ucsUCRV; machine/password/length and machine/password/complexity (Bug 31281).
The functions getLDAPURIs and getLDAPServersCommaList have been added to the Python lib, which return all configured LDAP servers (Bug 19753).
Added UMCConnection to the Python lib, moved from the Univention App Center (Bug 31058, Bug 31908).
PackageManager now checks installation status correctly (Bug 31261).
The &ucsUCRV; descriptions in univention-lib have been revised (Bug 30943).
Two new functions ucs_registerLDAPExtension and ucs_unregisterLDAPExtension have been implemented (Bug 32392, Bug 26785, Bug 32643, Bug 32663).
Two functions comments were fixed (Bug 28714).
The function ucs_isServiceUnused now always searches on the DC master system and can authenticate to the LDAP with the join credentials (Bug 32578).
The &ucsUCRV; descriptions in univention-dhcp have been revised (Bug 30948).
The file containing the cached DNS zone is now also deleted upon zone deletion (Bug 16270).
The &ucsUCRV; descriptions in univention-bind have been revised (Bug 30948).

The &ucsUCRV; mail/cyrus/imap/duplicatesuppression (default: yes) has been added to univention-mail-cyrus. If set to yes, lmtpd will suppress delivery of a message to a mailbox if same message with the same message-id (or resent-message-id) has already been delivered to the mailbox (Bug 22429).

A new &ucsUCR; template /var/lib/cyrus/db/DB_CONFIG for the cyrus bdb configuration has been added. This template is registered to UCR variables with the prefix mail/cyrus/bdb/dbconfig/. All these variables, without the prefix, and the values are written to the DB_CONFIG file. Default settings for the DB_CONFIG file are: mail/cyrus/bdb/dbconfig/set_lg_regionmax="2097152" mail/cyrus/bdb/dbconfig/set_cachesize="0 2097152 1" (Bug 28464)

The listener module for the management of IMAP mailboxes has been revised. Only if the attribute mailHomeServer is set at a user object, the mailbox is created. If the mailHomeServer attribute is removed from a user object, the mailbox will be deleted (Bug 29605).
The Cyrus configuration now uses the LDAP servers configured through the &ucsUCRV; ldap/server/addition too (Bug 19753).
The PAM tool pam_univentionmailcyrus supports a comma-separated list for the option ldap_host (Bug 19753).
The new &ucsUCRV; mail/postfix/smtpd/debug has been added to configure whether the smtpd should be started in debug mode (Bug 29593).
The description for an obsolete &ucsUCRV; has been removed in (Bug 24715).
The Postfix configuration now uses the LDAP servers configured through the &ucsUCRV; ldap/server/addition too (Bug 19753).
An unjoin script for univention-mail-server has been added (Bug 32454).
univention-antivir-mail has been modified. Postfix configuration will be reloaded after installation (Bug 17967).
univention-spamassassin has been modified. Obsolete &ucsUCRV; mail/antispam/globalfolder has been removed (Bug 31072).
Unused &ucsUCRV;s have been removed from univention-antivir-mail (Bug 30900).
The licensing information of univention-antivir-mail has been updated (Bug 31332).
Changed the SystemGroup parameter. SystemGroups are now separated by a blank character and not by a comma in cupsd.conf. The &ucsUCRV; must remain a comma separated list though (Bug 28884).
Always create a samba printers configuration file and not only if client driver is activated, the samba name is set or ACLs are defined (Bug 30432).
Added ErrorPolicy in univention-printserver to the CUPS template. ErrorPolicy can be set over the &ucsUCRV; cups/errorpolicy. The change will be applied to all printers (Bug 28877).
Modified univention-ldapsearch in join scripts to request LDAP on DC-Master not on local DC. Credentials of the join user will be used for authentication.(Bug 19101).
Modified univention-lpadmin. lpadmin output (info, errors, warnings) enabled.(Bug 17660).
The &ucsUCRV; descriptions in univention-printclient have been revised (Bug 30943).
Descriptions for the Univention Configuration Registry variables used in univention-check-printers have been added (Bug 22544).
Modified and improved checking for disabled printers in univention-check-printers (Bug 28558).
Package dependencies to univention-printserver and bsd-mailx have been added to univention-check-printers (Bug 29123).
A join script has been added to univention-printquota to create the domain service PrintQuota (Bug 23884).
The &ucsUCRV; descriptions in univention-printserver, univention-check-printers and univention-printquota have been revised (Bug 30948).
Added a pop-up message in case of editing print quota without installed package univention-printquota (Bug 29001).
When changing a printer, the file /etc/samba/printers.conf is refreshed directly (Bug 31764).

Unjoin scripts have been added to the packages univention-printserver and univention-printquoata. The unjoin scripts removes the service entry from the server object and the default &ucsUCRV;s (Bug 32452).
The handling of the univentionPrinterUseClientDriver attribute has been fixed in the cups-printers listener module (Bug 32669).
CUPS has been re-built against the updated heimdal library (Bug 32438).

The property Use Windows client driver has been removed from the printer shares. During update the corresponding LDAP attribute will be removed on all printers hosted by the updated server, which in turn will remove the corresponding samba option from the local printer share definitions. The samba option is not required any longer because the print spool code has been updated in the new Samba version. (Bug 31624).
Heimdal Kerberos has been updated to Version 1.6 (Bug 32195).
The ownership of /usr/share/univention-heimdal/check_cracklib.py has been fixed (Bug 22926).
The &ucsUCRV; descriptions in univention-heimdal have been revised (Bug 30943).
The process kpasswdd is now only started on the UCS master (Bug #20167).
The package pam-krb5-migrate has been updated to 0.0.10-1 (Bug 32438).
Fixed a regression in group authentication if &ucsUCRV; squid/auth/allowed_groups was not set (Bug 30969).
When using NTLM authentication it is now checked if the user account is locked or disabled (Bug 29492).

Proxy NEGOTIATE authentication support has been added to univention-squid. In this mode the authenticator squid_ldap_ntlm_auth is a negotiate wrapper for either Kerberos or NTLM over negotiate. The previous negotiate authenticator setting can be restored by setting the &ucsUCRV; squid/krb5auth/tool to /usr/lib/squid3/squid_kerb_auth (Bug 31972).
A problem in the squid the ntlm authentication helper in interaction with office2013 has been fixed (Bug 32183).
The &ucsUCRV; descriptions in univention-squid and univention-dansguardian have been revised (Bug 30948).

The package univention-squid-kerberos does not depend on univention-samba4 anymore. In addition, the joinscript 98univention-squid-samba4.inst now corectly saves its status when not in a samba4 environment (Bug 32011).
The join script of the package univention-squid-kerberos failed on samba3 dc slaves in a samba3/samba4 mixed environment. This bug has been fixed (Bug 32186).
An unjoin script has been added to the package univention-squid. The unjoin script removes the PROXY service from the server object and the default &ucsUCRV;s (Bug 32447).
The &ucsUCRV; descriptions in univention-apache have been revised (Bug 30948).

The package univention-apache now offers the file /var/www/ucs-overview/languages.json, which contains available server languages and can be controlled by &ucsUCRV;s ucs/server/languages/* (Bug 32677).

As &ucsUCRV; umc/server/languages/.* has been renamed to &ucsUCRV; ucs/server/languages/.*, possible user defined variables will be adopted during package update. In addtion, locales will be read from /var/www/ucs-overview/languages.json in the future instead of /var/www/ucs-overview/entries.json (Bug 32678).

On systems which are no domain controller master, the UCS overview page will contain a link to the domain controller master. On systems which neither are domain controller master nor domain controller backups, certificate related links will not be shown anymore (Bug 32647).
The default value for the &ucsUCRV; nagios/server/checkexternalcmd has been changed to yes (Bug 29839).
The &ucsUCRV; descriptions in univention-nagios have been revised (Bug 30944).
An unjoin script for univention-nagios-server has been added (Bug 32453).
The &ucsUCRV; descriptions in univention-ssl have been revised (Bug 30943).
The start script for the NFS server has been synchronized with the upstream version to support newer Linux kernels and start all services needed for the PXE installer to work (Bug 32228).
The &ucsUCRV; descriptions in univention-nfs have been revised (Bug 30948).
NFSv4 is now activated by default in UCS 3.2. Shares are accessible by clients depending on their capabilities. To disable NFSv4 support the &ucsUCRV; nfs/nfsd/nfs4 can be set to false (Bug 21556).
The &ucsUCRV; nssldap/nss_srv has been added to specify whether or not libnss-ldap is allowed to perform DNS SRV record lookups (default: true, Bug 30779).
The &ucsUCRV; descriptions in univention-pam have been revised (Bug 30943).
Added a test in the postinst script of libnss-ldap to prevent the override of libnss-ldap.secret if it is a link Bug 30779).
The tool ldap-group-to-file.py does now support postrun hooks located in /var/lib/ldap-group-to-file-hooks.d/. Thus scripts can be executed after changing the group memberships Bug 32581).
The config option nss_srv (to deny DNS SRV record lookups) has been add to libnss-ldap (Bug 30779).
Create empty PostgreSQL configuration files during postrm so that PostgreSQL can be reinstalled (Bug 27786).
Fixed PostgreSQL service not controllable by the System services module (Bug 16848).
Restart PostgreSQL server in postinst (Bug 27786).
The PostgreSQL configuration file /etc/postgresql/pam_ldap.conf now uses the univention Python lib to generate the LDAP URI (Bug 19753).

The rotation of machine passwords is performed in intervals of days configurable through the &ucsUCRV; server/password/change. The date is now calculated relative to the date of the last password change instead of being relative to the start of the current year (Bug 31068).

The welcome message for SSH is now shown through motd. It is only displayed if the message from appliance mode isn't enabled. It can be disabled by setting the &ucsUCRV; sshd/motd to false (Bug 31096). The new &ucsUCRV; sshd/banner can be used to configure a banner display for SSH logins.

By default the mysql server package does not set a password for the mysql root user during a non-interactive installation. With this update the mysql package sets a password and writes the password to /etc/mysql.secret. This file can be read by root. If a password is already set, nothing will be done (Bug 19354).
The logging of univention-mount-homedir now uses univention-mount-homedir instead of logger at the start of every message and the log messages were improved (Bug 31256).
The performance of univention-mount-homedir was improved to reduce server load during concurrent logins (Bug 31256).
The context menu on the devices page of active VMs no longer disappears when the mouse is moved (Bug 29261).
The &ucsUCRV; descriptions in univention-virtual-machine-manager-node and univention-virtual-machine-manager-daemon have been revised (Bug 30949).
A typo in the German translation has been fixed (Bug 22377).
To fix the ordering of snapshots their creation time is now display in ISO 8601 format (Bug 29901).
Shutting down virtual machines using 'ACPI power off' and 'Xen shutdown' was added (Bug 21397).
The internal code of UVMM was cleaned up (Bug 30897, Bug 32091).
Support for the System services module has been added for Xen (Bug 10962).
Creating snapshots of suspended virtual machines is now prevented (Bug 23436).
The labels to enable VNC have been synchronized (Bug 31947).
The syntax for the profile DN in LDAP info objects has been changed to do an LDAP search and provide a drop-down list of available profiles (Bug 24774).
The syntax for the comment field in UVMM info LDAP objects has been changed to a multi-line text field (Bug 32044).
The value for the memory size and storage volumes is now validated in the frontend (Bug 27778).

When creating a new storage volume, the available storage size is shown for each storage pool. A warning is printed when the size for a new storage volume exceeds the available size in the storage pool (Bug 19281).
The dialog for editing network interfaces now correctly starts with the current values. Multicast MAC addresses are now detected and rejected (Bug 30806).
New domains are now created on the selected node by default (Bug 24579).

The storage pool handling has been overhauled and now better supports different storage pools. Especially a bug has been fixed, which could result in deleting the wrong storage volume when multiple storage pools were used (Bug 32098).
Profiles for UCS-3.0 are no longer created. Instead profiles for UCS-3.2 are created (Bug 32261).
An unjoin script has been added to package univention-virtual-machine-manager-daemon. The unjoin script removes the UVMM service from the server object and removes the default &ucsUCRV;s (Bug 32449).
The Java based VNC viewer has been replaced by noVNC, a JavaScript and HTML5 based VNC client (Bug 30540).
A logic bug in the init script for xenstore was fixed (Bug 28309).
The &ucsUCRV; descriptions in univention-xen have been revised (Bug 30949).
CD-ROM media changes is now also supported with Xen-HVM domains (Bug 23394).
Support for the system servicesmodule has been added (Bug 10962).
An obsolete dependency has been removed in the univention-xen meta package (Bug 31373).

An unjoin script has been added to package univention-virtual-machine-manager-node-xen. The unjoin script removes the Xen service from the server object and removes the default &ucsUCRV;s (Bug 32450).
The GPLPV drivers were updated to version 0.11.0-372 (Bug 29456).
QEMU was upgraded to version 1.1.2+dfsg-6 (Bug 29849).
The VirtIO drivers were updated to version 0.1-65 (Bug 27717).

An unjoin script has been added to package univention-virtual-machine-manager-node-kvm. The unjoin script removes the KVM service from the server object and removes the default &ucsUCRV;s (Bug 32448).
univention-x-core no longer depends on the package univention-gdm but recommends it (Bug 31004).
The &ucsUCRV; descriptions for univention-gdm, univention-kde, univention-mozilla-firefox, univention-ooffice2 and univention-x-core have been revised (Bug 30944).

The installation package for the Flash plugin (univention-flashplugin) was removed. The base desktop in UCS is provided for accessing the web-based management tools of UCS, for which Flash isn't needed. Existing plugins from a previous installation should be removed manually: /usr/lib/flashplugin-nonfree (Bug 31852).
The Samba packages have been updated to version 4.1.0 RC2. The file server component is provided by the package samba as usual (Bug 31698).
Samba 3 does now support quota on XFS file systems like expected, for example the calculation of the partition limit or the used space (Bug 31210).
There is now a service definition for winbind (Bug 9560).
The Winbind init script did not ensure that the daemon actually got stopped. This could lead to a non running winbind daemon after the server password change. This issue has been fixed (Bug 31289).
The file /etc/samba/shares.conf is now refreshed directly after changing a share (Bug 29399).
The &ucsUCRV; descriptions in univention-samba have been revised (Bug 30948).
The configuration of the &ucsUCRV; windows/domain has been removed from the postinst script of univention-samba (Bug 24442).
To minimize the time where /etc/samba/shares.conf includes non-existing files, it is now updated directly after a share was added/removed or renamed (Bug 29399).
The &ucsUCRV; samba/max_protocol has been renamed to &ucsUCRV; samba/max/protocol (Bug 31921).
An unjoin script has been added to the package univention-samba. The unjoin script removes the Samba 3 service from the server object and removes the default Samba UCR variables (Bug 32445).
New Samba 3 installations now uses SMB2 as the maximum supported SMB protocol. On updated systems NT1 is still used. (Bug 32394).
The support for the ldap filter parameter has been removed from the source package (Bug 32223).
With the new samba upstream package the secrets.tdb file has been moved to /var/lib/samba/private/. This is now considered in the password change hook (Bug 32789).

The Samba packages have been updated to version 4.1.0 RC3. The components providing Active Directory compatible domain services are now provided by the package samba-ad-dc. The file server component is provided by the package samba as usual (Bug 31698).
Samba 4 does now support quota on XFS file systems (Bug 31234).
The &ucsUCRV; descriptions in univention-samba4 have been revised (Bug 30948).
Joining into a new samba4/join/site without Samba4 on the Master now respects the chosen samba4/dc (Bug 30792).
The script sysvol-sync.py did not preserve timestamps, now it does (Bug 30823).
The script sysvol-cleanup.py moved the PolicyDefinitions away. Now it considers only GPO paths (Bug 31186).
The unused &ucsUCRV;s samba/client_use_spnego and &ucsUCRV; samba/time_server have been removed (Bug 26389).
Periodic refresh of sysvol fACLs for the group Authenticated Users can now be disabled with the new &ucsUCRV; samba4/sysvol/sync/setfacl/AU Bug 31271).
Samba4 DCs are now added to the group Enterprise Domain Controllers by default during initial join (Bug 31437).
The listener module samba4-idmap now also works in case smb.conf includes files readable only for root (Bug 31538).
Fixed file permissions of /var/lib/samba/ntp_signd (Bug 31109).
To minimise the time where /etc/samba/shares.conf includes non-existing files, it is now updated directly after a share was added/removed or renamed (Bug 31800).

In case a Samba 4 service is detected in the domain during join, UCS LDAP servers now take care that they are not registered with port 7389 in the _ldap._tcp SRV DNS record. If such entries are already present, they will be removed automatically during the update (Bug 29462).
Support for the &ucsUCRV; samba/max/protocol has been added (Bug 31145).
Samba4 DCs are now configured to use the local KDC (Bug 29291).
The config file /etc/krb5.conf will get comitted from the updated UCR template on update (Bug 31306).

The default for the &ucsUCRV; samba4/sysvol/sync/setfacl/AU has been changed to false, so the sysvol-sync script does not set read access fACLs for the group Authenticated Users each time it is run by cron (Bug 31275).
In some cases the sysvol ownership was not yet updated correctly after the installation or join of univention-samba4. This is now detected and fixed during updates and new installations. (Bug 31640).

In some cases the join of a Samba DC results in a conflicted host account. To prevent this issue, the univention-samba4 join script waits until the host account was replicated to the S4 connector host through the DRS replication. (Bug 32257).
An unjoin script has been added to the package univention-samba4. The unjoin script removes the Samba 4 service from the server object and removes the default Samba UCR variables (Bug 32446).
New Samba 4 installations now uses SMB2 as the maximum supported SMB protocol. On updated systems NT1 is still used. (Bug 32394).
During the update to UCS 3.2 the local Samba 4 DC is added to the group Enterprise Domain Controllers (Bug 31572).
The Samba 4 directory /var/lib/samba is now cleaned up during the rejoin of the system (Bug 32595).
The Samba 4 daemon will now be restarted during the server password roatation (Bug 32468).
A configuration for the default idmap config * has been added to the samba 4 configuration. The new default can be overwritten via /etc/samba/local.conf (Bug 32376).
The default Samba 4 groups are now created in the Samba 4 join script or during the initial synchronization of the S4 connector (Bug 32461).
A traceback has been fixed in the script purge_s4_computer.py, which could occurr if a DC was removed from a Samba4/AD site. (Bug 30763).
The sysvol synchronization is started after the Samba 4 join scripts are finished (Bug 29662).
The default Samba 4 well known security principals are now created as groups in OpenLDAP to allocate a gidNumber for these principals (Bug 29000).

The option force group=Authenticated Users has been removed from the sysvol share definition. Now it is possible for users with the primary group Domain Admins to create and to modify GPOs (Bug 30999).
The attribute sambaMaxPwdAge can be set to -1 in OpenLDAP. This will now be mapped to 0 in Samba 4 since -1 is not allowed for the attribute maxPwdAge (Bug 29775).
Samba4 DCs are now added to the group Enterprise Domain Controllers (Bug 31437).
The &ucsUCRV; descriptions in univention-s4-connector have been revised (Bug 30948).
Logging of add and modify operations against the Samba 4 directory has been improved, especially in the case of a traceback (Bug 31133).
The displayName attribute definition has been moved from post_attributes to attributes in the user mapping definition. This increases the synchronization performance (Bug 32323).
A separate SID compare function has been added which considers the SID coding in Samba 4. This increases the synchronization performance, since the SID will only be set if it differs (Bug 32322).
If the LDAP connection was closed the connector tries to re-open the LDAP connection automatically (Bug 32274).
To improve synchronisation performance the group mapping now uses set objects instead of list objects (Bug 32276).
Some internal operations have been optimized to prevent endless synchronisations in large environments (Bug 32213).
A cast from string to long has been added while synchronizing time values (Bug 32329).

An unjoin script has been added to the package univention-s4-connector. The unjoin script removes the S4 Connector service from the server object and removes the default S4 Connector UCR variables (Bug 32451).
The synchronization of Samba4 password change timestamps now correctly considers the local timezone variables (Bug 32227).
A server password change script has been added. The S4 connector will be restarted in case it uses the machine account (Bug 32529).
The S4 connector now considers the scenario that an object was moved to a position which is not replicated to this server. This is for example the case in UCS@school. Bug 32542).
The S4 connector no longer synchronizes the password for Slave PDC DCs from Samba 4 to OpenLDAP. This prevents a synchronization loop in some selective replication scenarios. Bug 32690).
The S4 connector does no longer synchronizes rejected objects before the initialization phase is complete Bug 32852).

The S4 connector can now synchronizes the different group types (local, domain local, global and universal) if the &ucsUCRV; connector/s4/mapping/group/grouptype is set to true. By default this is activated for new UCS 3.2 installations only. All other systems have to be migrated manually (Bug 32768, Bug 29486).
Additional hints are shown during the Active Directory Connector setup about possibilities to configure DNS resolution for the required Windows server FQDN (Bug 24903).
The &ucsUCRV; descriptions in univention-ad-connector have been revised (Bug 30948).

A join and an unjoin script have been added to the package univention-ad-connector. The join script adds the AD Connector service to the server object and the unjoin script removes the service (Bug 32455).
An unjoin script has been added to the package univention-nagios-ad-connector. The unjoin script removes the server entry from the AD connector nagios service object (Bug 32455).

The AD connector can now synchronizes the different group types (domain local, global and universal) if the &ucsUCRV; connector/ad/mapping/group/grouptype is set to true. By default this is activated for new UCS 3.2 installations only. All other systems have to be migrated manually (Bug 32769).
A test has been added to check if the ,,Administrator'' user may execute univention-directory-manager users/user list --filter uid=Administrator (Bug 30116
A test case for univention-dnsedit has been added (Bug 31104).
A test case for the server password change has been added (Bug 31295).

The function user_create from the internal test framework now checks whether the mail domain exists or not. If the mail domain for the local domain does not exist the user is created without a mail address (Bug 31296).
The test case for validating that groupname LDAP locking objects are removed properly will not be executed on DC slaves anymore (Bug 11417).

The &ucsUCRV;s tests/domainadmin/account, tests/domainadmin/pwd and tests/domainadmin/pwdfile have been added. They can be used to configure which domain administrator credentials ucs-test should use when running tests (Bug 31250).
The connector tests have been reordered to avoid a connector restart for every test (Bug 31677).
The different return codes of ucs-test have been merged (Bug 31734).

New functions have been added to get a better support of non DC Master systems, for example udm-test or wait_for_replication. The existing test cases have been adapted (Bug 31687, Bug 31678, Bug 31679, Bug 31680, Bug 32025, Bug 32797).
The Winbind test has been improved to work more reliable on UCS memberservers in Samba4 domains (Bug 31772

Now there is a test block samba-common for tests that are common to Samba versions 3 and 4. The robustness against DRS and rsync replication delays has been improved in some tests (Bug 28343, Bug 28348, Bug 29057, Bug 29058, Bug 29062).
The Samba3 join test has been removed (Bug 31835).
Samba4 NTACL tests have been improved a bit (Bug 29230).
The tests for Samba share permissions have been improved (Bug 29054).
The samba test case for creating spn accounts has been improved (Bug 32778).

Under certain circumstances samba 3.6.8 reports a timeout for the unix password sync during password changes. Since the password change is successful nonetheless, two test cases have been adjusted to tolerate this flaw (Bug 31794).
Several UDM test cases have been added (Bug 31652, Bug 31653, Bug 31654, Bug 31655, Bug 31656, Bug 31658, Bug 31657, Bug 31659, Bug 31661, Bug 31660).
The tools import_ldif_with_listener, import_ldif_without_listener and an example customer LDIF with 5000 users and other objects have been added to ucs-test-tools (Bug 29418).
A test has been added to check if an app was successfully installed (Bug 31793).
The LDAP tests to check replication have been improved (Bug 27662, Bug 29337, Bug 31721, Bug 31722, Bug 32537, Bug 32795).
ucs-tests now uses ucslint (Bug 28699).
Some corner cases are now handled better in ucs-test (Bug 31795).
For it's duration, the test "16packages_default" from section "base" will disable the cron daemon (Bug 32006)
An improved test case for concurrent authenticated smbclient sessions is now available (Bug 26807, Bug 32715).
Improved test cases for samba share and folder access permissions are now available (Bug 29056)
Performance test cases for large environments have been added to ucs-test (Bug 31695).
A Python wrapper for the UDM CLI has been added (Bug 30560).
Python child processes are started with unbuffered output by default (Bug 31819).
An internal ucs-test library for creating computer accounts now uses windows by default (Bug 32780).
The test case 10_ldap/44replication_binary has been modified in order to fulfill the requirements of the new UDM syntax for JPEG photos (Bug 32664).:wq
The test case 00_base/47faillog_ssh-smb-krb has been disabled for UCS 3.2-0 (Bug 19016).
univention-user-quota has been rewritten in Python. It does now support share names with whitespaces (Bug 30636, Bug 31957).
The &ucsUCRV; descriptions in univention-system-info have been revised (Bug 30946).

Provide a modprobe configuration file for vmwgfx (the DRM driver for vmware) to enable fbdev support. Otherwise startup freezes in bootsplash and on the command line occur when installed in Vmware ESXi (Bug 32536).
ocfs2-tools was updated to version 1.6.4 (Bug 28979).
The &ucsUCRV; descriptions in univention-base-files, univention-server, univention-skel, univention-passwd-store and univention-quota have been revised (Bug 30943).
The drbd8 userland tools have been updated to version 8.4.3 (Bug 31321, Bug 32019).
The &ucsUCRV; descriptions in univention-log-collector, univention-postgresql, univention-snmpd and univention-bacula have been revised (Bug 30948).
Shell escaping in univention-home-mounter has been fixed (Bug 19441).
univention-backup2master now also replaces the &ucsUCRV; kerberos/kpasswdserver with the new masters's FQDN (Bug 31077).
Deprecated checks for some multivalue attributes have been removed (Bug 18929).
Several language misstakes in various packages have been corrected (Bug 32662).

The following packages have been added to the maintained section of the software repository (Bug 31562, Bug 30888, Bug 31075, Bug 32175, Bug 32011, Bug 32196, Bug 32670, Bug 32693, Bug 32508): univention-squid-kerberos, libdbd-mysql, libjs-jquery, duplicity, librsync,libappconfig-perl, liblist-moreutils-perl,libparams-validate-perl, libdatetime-locale-perl, libclass-singleton-perl, libdatetime-timezone-perl,libdatetime-perl, libpg-perl,libemail-address-perl, librose-object-perl,libclass-factory-util-perl,
